biography.value:
Champions are mighty warriors who have honed their fighting skills in wars or gladiatorial pits. To soldiers and other people who fight for a living, champions are as influential as nobles, and their presence is courted as a sign of status among rulers.

A typical champion bears a coat of arms, heraldry that is associated with the champion far and wide. You may create a coat of arms for a champion or roll on the Champion’s Coats of Arms table to determine it.

Champion’s Coats of Arms

d12 Coat of Arms
1 Three lit candles on a purple field
2 Sea serpent coiled around a trident on a blue field
3 Hunting horn banded in gold on a gray field
4 Raised fist grasping an anchor on a quartered field of blue and white
5 Turtle with crenelated tower on its shell on a white field
6 Dragon skull supported on either side by dragon wings on a red field
7 Yellow chicken foot on a black field
8 Lightning bolt splitting a galley in two on a blue field
9 Two crouching displacer beast;displacer beasts facing each other on a yellow field
10 Knotted brambles on a green field
11 Red owlbear with a silver crown on a checkered field of black and white
12 Black anvil cracked down the middle on an orange field

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

The champion makes three Greatsword or Shortbow attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage, plus [[/damage 2d6 type=slashing average=true]] damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, plus [[/damage 2d6 type=piercing average=true]] damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Indomitable (2/Day). The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The champion regains [[/damage 20 type=heal average=false]] hit points.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
